• The achievement of 90 per cent immunization among
children below one year old, the eradication of polio,the elimination of neonatal tetanus, a 90 per centreduction in measles cases and a 95 per cent reductionin measles deaths (compared to pre-immunization days).
• A halving of the 1990 child deaths caused by diarrhoeal
diseases.
